name: Verify Manager can invite Reader to a project
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Manager` role.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can invite `third user` as `Reader` to a project.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Invite second user to project with Manager role.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager can invite third user as Reader to a project.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Manager` role.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can invite `third user` as `Reader` to a project.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.

  • Create new project via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Invite second user to project with Manager role.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager can invite third user as Reader to a project.
